```{r,eval=F,echo=F}
install.packages("maptools")
```


```{r,eval=F}
library(maptools)
onb <- readShapePoly("onb_grenzen.shp")
```

```{r,eval=F}
par(mai=c(0,0,0,0))
plot(onb)
```
